amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph, Offshore Exclusions which shall not include oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Northern California planning area.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude any oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Northern California planning area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 218 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 218 (Roll no. 46).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
